controls.label: Brush Size
controls.description: Sets the size of the brush in pixels.

controls.label: Brush Opacity
controls.description: Controls brush opacity from transparent to fully opaque.

controls.label: Strength
controls.description: Negative values darken, positive values brighten the image.

controls.label: Gamma
controls.description: Gamma correction. Values < 1 brighten shadows, > 1 darken highlights.

controls.label: Midpoint
controls.description: Defines the tonal midpoint for brightness scaling.

controls.label: Localized
controls.description: Enhance brightness locally in darker regions.

controls.label: Target Edge (px)
controls.description: Target size for the longest image edge.
